__e: No, the best part of it is I own 50%.
If that means, "Do I own the place?" then the answer is yes, but I'm thinking I should be saying no.
My true love has my heart and I have hers. My heart in me keeps her and me in one.
That is actually not one of the many reasons that I don't own a gun.
You know, I came to this country with nothing, and now I'll be a homeowner. It's the American dream.
But it would seem that as I possess a ship and you don't, you're the ones in need of rescuing, and I'm not sure as I'm in the mood.
The fact is, I take a lot of heat in this town... thanks to the properties I own and the plans I have... but I love New York.
I have no money and everything I own is outside in a truck.
.. and deign to understand that all I have is hers... .. forever and a day.
I now own a suit, and it didn't fall off a truck.
And now, I own my own laptop.
Well, I did, and there was a little mix up, and now I have a pig.
Even though you know now I don't carry the Lexicon?
My life, her life, my children.
Because I have the one thing you need now more than anything... hope.
